description: This file declares external functions for interacting with configuration parameters and instance numbers in the Cosa framework, specifically for WAN and system environment retrieval. It defines function prototypes related to getting parameter values and instance numbers, with no actual implementation details.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueUlong
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG configuration parameter value by name.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueString
methods.description: Retrieves a string configuration parameter value by name, storing it in the provided buffer.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueBool
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean configuration parameter value by name.

methods.name: CosaGetInstanceNumberByIndex
methods.description: Retrieves an instance number based on object name and index.
